metadata.name: ETERNITY
metadata.description:
Introducing Synthetica, the cutting-edge collection that brings together art, technology, and nature in a mesmerizing display of colour and form.

 Each piece in this collection is AI-assisted, crafted with precision and care to showcase the beauty of abstract art and the wonders of the natural world.

At the heart of Synthetica are the long coloured lines that dominate each composition. These lines are not mere brushstrokes, but carefully generated by the latest AI algorithms to create patterns and textures that are both striking and unique. 

Whether they curve and flow like water, or twist and turn like musical notes on a page, these lines are the backbone of each piece in the collection.

But Synthetica is not just about lines and colours. Each piece is infused with references to abstract art, photography, water, and music, making for a truly immersive experience.
